drinks.name: Martini
drinks.recipe: Mix 3 parts vodka & 1 part dry vermouth.

drinks.name: Negroni
drinks.description: A nice drink for a late night conversation.
drinks.recipe: Mix equal parts of gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
drinks.serve: Serve cold, either on the rocks or straight up.

drinks.name: Gin and Tonic
drinks.description: Like regular tonic, but with gin.
drinks.recipe: Mix 2 parts gin & 1 part tonic water.
drinks.serve: Serve in a tall glass over ice, garnished with a lime wedge.

drinks.name: Mint Julep
drinks.description: Signature drink of the Kentucky Derby.  This refresher composed of bourbon, sugar, mint and crushed ice shouldnâ€™t be reserved for only one day a year.
drinks.recipe: Add bourbon and mint syrup,  then pack the glass tightly with crushed ice.  Stir until the cup is frosted on the outside.
drinks.serve: Add a sprig of mint and enjoy!

drinks.name: Tequila Sunrise
drinks.description: A tequila sunrise cocktail has a sunrise-like appearance making it a welcome option any day!
drinks.recipe: Combine the juice and tequila in a cocktail shaker with a cup of ice. Shake and pour the mixture into a highball glass over ice. Pour in the grenadine and let it settle on the bottom.
drinks.serve: Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

snacks.name: Nachos
snacks.recipe: Cover expensive, organic tortilla chips with Cheez Whiz.
snacks.serve: Serve in a hand-thrown ceramic bowl, garnished with canned black olives

snacks.name: Hummus
snacks.description: Sure to impress your vegan friends!
snacks.serve: Place unceremoniously on the table, along with pita bread.

snacks.name: Arugula and Walnut Salad
snacks.recipe: Mix arugula, toasted walnuts, and thinly-sliced Parmesan cheese. Dress with lemon and olive oil.
snacks.serve: Place on tiny, precious little plates.

snacks.name: Nachos Supreme
snacks.description: Hole Mole! You'll need a box of tissues with these nachos!
snacks.recipe: Put a ton of jalapenos all over the nachos, beef, cheese, and pico de gallo.
snacks.serve: Serve with a pitcher of water and tissues.

snacks.name: Bagel Pizza
snacks.recipe: Add pizza sauce and cheese to mini bagels. Bake on a cookie sheet at 350 degrees for 10 minutes.

snacks.name: Bruschetta
snacks.description: Easy to throw together and made up of simple, classic ingredients, bruschetta was made for chill warm weather snacking.
snacks.recipe: Mix diced tomatoes, olive oil, crushed garlic and basil. Brush slices of french bread with olive oil and garlic, and toast until golden brown.
snacks.serve: Spoon tomatoes mixture over toasted garlic bread and serve!
